Intelligent upgrades help hotels reduce costs and increase efficiency and improve guest experience

For Brand Partners

For KA customers with vast resources in the hotel industry, help them build smart hotel solutions that can achieve centralized operation and management of hotel projects, smart devices, channel agents, service providers, etc. And support customized exclusive brands and domain names.

[

Learn More

](https://hotel.tuya.com/brand)

For Hoteliers

For terminal hotel owners, help them realize the functions required for daily hotel operations such as check-in, room status, room service, energy consumption, equipment, and personnel management. At the same time, it supports third-party PMS and smart speaker access.
